input: Lily purchased a telescope last week and now spends her evenings stargazing.
Emma writes food reviews for a travel magazine and recently explored South American cuisine.
Celine learned to play the violin from her grandfather, who once performed in Vienna.
John collects vintage cameras and has a growing archive of black-and-white cityscapes.
John Zoe is the CEO of a chip manufacturing company and is 35 years old.
His mom, Lily, graduated from Yale University and is a founder of a tech company.
Celine Zoe is a five-year-old girl, full of curiosity and energy.
Although only five years old, Celine is very expressive, always sharing her thoughts with those around her.
She knew that her dad, John, was an executive, working hard to make important decisions in his company
Everyone around Mike Zoe described him as an introvert.
